benchmark_details.name: BioMaze
benchmark_details.overview: BioMaze is a benchmark designed to evaluate LLMsâ€™ ability to understand and reason about biological pathways, containing 5.1K high-quality, complex biological pathway problems derived from real research.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the reasoning abilities of LLMs in biological tasks through the lens of biological pathways.

data.source: Generated from over 6,000 biological pathway research papers, involving True/False and open-ended questions.
data.annotation: Questions reviewed and validated by human experts.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy for True/False tasks is averaged across True and False labels; open-ended tasks involve comparing generated answers to ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better reasoning ability in biological pathways.
methodology.baseline_results: CoT and various graph-augmented methods including PATHSEEKER were used for comparison.
methodology.validation: Evaluation results across various biological reasoning tasks were validated.
